background_description: The background consists of a marshy wetland area with vibrant green reeds and grasses. Behind the greenery, there is a calm body of water, appearing blue-grey. Sparse, light-colored bare tree branches are visible amongst the distant vegetation. The immediate foreground is a weathered, light brown wooden railing where the birds are perched.
explanation: The two pigeons are prominently displayed against a natural background of green marshland and blue water. Their grey and white plumage, along with iridescent green and purple feathers on their necks, contrasts significantly with the dominant green and blue hues of the environment. They are perched on a distinct wooden railing, further separating them from the background. The pigeon on the right also has bright red and green leg bands, which make it even more conspicuous. There is no visual resemblance in terms of color, pattern, or texture to help them blend in with their surroundings.
